title: France panorama. [No. 70/38]
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Hospitals
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/France - Politics and government
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Republicanism - France
description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. The European swimming championships - French swimmers in good shape during the first days of the European championships at Barcelone. 2. The centennial of the French Republic - the Third Republic is 100 years old. What it has stood for. 3. A modern hospital - the new Ambroise Pare Hospital in Paris. 4. Tribute to Francois Mauriac - excerpts from film sequences shot in the French writer's Malagar estate shortly before his death.
